title: Warm Weather
description: With its 24 ° C you are going to challenge yourself to the imposing mountains and crossings of Quindío, enjoying a delicious Colombian coffee and sweet fruits from the area.

title: Mild Weather
description: It is the perfect climate for you to enjoy the ride through small and large mountains, some routes will make you improve and challenge yourself.

title: Cold Weather
description: You will ride over 3440 MSNM, enjoy the stops, lagoons and cultures. Where you will meet from the salt mine of Zipaquirá, to monserrate in Bogotá.

title: Warm Weather
description: With 31 ° C you can ride your bike between rivers, ravines, deserts like tatacoa and the longest port in the world: EL ALTO DE LETRAS, you will also measure your resistance and your physical condition.
